Ingredients.7: 1 (29 ounce) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained

Ingredients.8: 2 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes with green chile peppers

Ingredients.9: 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained

Ingredients.11: 1 medium jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped (Optional)

Ingredients.13: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained

Ingredients.14: 1 tablespoon sour cream, or to taste (Optional)

Ingredients.15: 1 tablespoon shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste (Optional)

Ingredients.16: 1 tablespoon chopped green onions, or to taste (Optional)

Ingredients.17: 1  jalapeno pepper, sliced, or to taste (Optional)

Directions.1: Heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat in a medium-sized pan. Cook and stir ground chicken in the hot skillet until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes. Drain and discard grease.

Directions.2: Combine chili powder, garlic, cumin, and red pepper flakes in a small bowl; stir into chicken to coat.

Directions.3: Transfer chicken to a slow cooker. Add kidney beans, diced tomatoes with chiles, black beans, onion, and chopped jalapeno. Pour chicken broth over mixture and stir to combine.

Directions.4: Cover and cook on High until chili has cooked down and thickened, about 4 hours, stirring corn kernels into mixture during last 30 minutes of cook time.

Directions.5: Spoon chili into bowls and top each with sour cream, Cheddar cheese, green onions, and sliced jalapeno.
